metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8874 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Stack consumption vulnerability in GD in PHP before 5.6.12 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service via a crafted imagefilltoborder call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8874` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libgd-tools - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.1
libgd3 - 2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

notes.Note: mdeslaur> php uses the system libgd2

criterions.comment: libgd2 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.1.1-4ubuntu0.16.04.1').
